name: TalkDancer
_source: s;Alina;You're doing a shit job of it, whoreson.|Your feet are everywhere.
s;Cultist;This is the dance of the Fates!{w} You wouldn't understand.
s;Alina;I know clumsy when I see it. Watch.
s;Cultist;M... maybe you have a point.|But I, uh, must take my leave for now.
s;Simon;I couldn't follow that at all.
s;Alina;You never learned how to ballroom dance? Really?
s;Simon;I was taught, but... always struggled.
s;Alina;Then you're lucky that Anuki doesn't seem like one for courtship.|...Honestly, that was fun.
s;Alina;He wasn't a happy student, but he learned fast.|I appreciate that.
s;Simon;Then maybe you really could teach me some day.
s;Cultist;Quiet. This is the one shrine that remains quiet.|The only one where I can practice my dance in peace.|DO NOT disturb me!
